name: ai-meeting-transcription
description: AI-powered meeting transcription and analysis platform with React frontend and FastAPI backend

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/dist frontend/.vite frontend/node_modules/.vite && cd frontend && npm run clean
scripts.test:backend: cd backend && python test_mistral.py && python test_direct_summary.py
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && echo 'âœ… Setup complete! Run npm run dev to start the application'
